Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Server Class

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Server.MatchParameters
    The MatchParameters class contains the two parameters needed to start a match.
    (package private) static class 
    Server.MessageQueueEntry
    MessageQueueEntry class is the object in the MessageQueue list.
    private class 
    Server.ServerSocketThread
    The ServerSocketThread class starts the ServerSocket to listen for new TCP connections.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int port) throws IOException
      Eryantis Server
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • getWaitingConnections

      public List<Connection> getWaitingConnections()
      getWaitingConnections()
      Returns:
      List of connections waiting in the Eryantis lobby.

    • getMatchParameters

      public Server.MatchParameters getMatchParameters()
      getMatchParameters()
      Returns:
      matchParameters consisting of (number of players, isExpert).

    • getFirstConnection

      public Connection getFirstConnection()
      getFirstConnection() Note: client of firstConnection decides matchParameters.
      Returns:
      firstConnection

    • setMatchParameters

      public void setMatchParameters(int waitingConnectionMax, boolean expert)
      Sets number of players, and if game is expert. Note: client of firstConnection decides matchParameters.
      Parameters:
      waitingConnectionMax - game lobby max size
      expert - is expert mode?

    • setMatchParameters

      public void setMatchParameters(Server.MatchParameters parameters)
      Sets only number of players if game is not expert. Note: client of firstConnection decides matchParameters.
      Parameters:
      parameters - type MatchParameters which includes variables for (int waitingConnectionMax, boolean isExpert)

    • getConnectionFromName

      public Connection getConnectionFromName(String name) throws IllegalMoveException
      Gets Connection object from connections list
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      Returns:
      Connection of client with given name
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when there is no client with given name

    • getConnectionsFromController

      public List<Connection> getConnectionsFromController(Controller controller)
      Gets list of clients associated to given controller. Note: association is by connectionControllerMap.
      Parameters:
      controller - game controller
      Returns:
      List of clients with given controller.

    • notifyMessage

      public void notifyMessage(Connection connection, Message message)
      Receives new messages from client's connection, puts message into the messageQueue, and notifies the server.
      Parameters:
      connection - client's Connection object
      message - client's message to server

    • registerConnection

      public void registerConnection(Connection newConnection)
      Adds newConnection to the server's connections and waitingConnection lists.
      Parameters:
      newConnection - The new connection

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection(Connection connection)
      Closes connection and removed it from the server's connections and waitingConnection lists.
      Parameters:
      connection - The connection to deregister

    • nameUsed

      public boolean nameUsed(String name)
      Checks if given name is connected
      Parameters:
      name - of player
      Returns:
      true if there is a connected player with the same name, false otherwise

    • checkWaitingConnections

      public void checkWaitingConnections() throws IOException, IllegalMoveException
      This function starts a new match, if there are enough players in the lobby. It is called from Connection.run() (another thread) when a client has provided all the required information (name, (max players, expert mode))
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations
      IllegalMoveException - If the number of players selected is not valid, so the controller cannot be instantiated

    • run

      public void run() throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Main server loop that processes all messages in the messageQueue
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted during the activity
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • handleClientMessage

      public void handleClientMessage(Connection connection, Message message) throws IOException
      Forwards the given message to all connections in the match controller. Note: if message is END_GAME, then all Connections associated to match controller are deregistered.
      Parameters:
      connection - client connection
      message - message from given client
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the server. The serverSocketThread stops TCP listening.
